pages.text: Hidden amongst the sweetness of $(thing)Candyland$() is the deadly. Watch out for these
pages.title: Mobs

pages.text: These lightweight creatures fly around Candyland, shooting hard pellets at their targets. They have very low health, but those pellets pack a punch
$(thing)Cane Bugs$() spawn within Infested Candy Canes. They don't have any special abilities, although they can drop some extra stuff, including the rare Cake
Despite their simple appearance, $(thing)Cherry Blasters$() are dangerous creatures that will fire barrages of explosive projectiles at nearby adventurers. They don't actually taste like cherries
These flying gingerbread mobs spawn in Gingerbird Aviaries. They don't have any special abilities
$(thing)Gingerbread Men$() spawn in Gingerbread Houses. They don't have any special abilities
$(thing)Lollypoppers$() spawn all around $(thing)Candyland$(). They explode on death, so try to kill from a distance if possible
